Title: Relates to processing of firearms license applications for victims of domestic abuse who have been issued an order of protection
Summary: Directs the licensing authority in each county to process firearms license applications for victims of domestic abuse who have been issued an order of protection within 14 days of receiving the application.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to processing of firearms license applications for victims of domestic abuse who have been issued an order of protection
